Desc.entry: Held annually in May, Sensoria is a 10 day festival celebrating Sheffield's music and filmmaking talent, providing a high profile showcase for the city's heritage. It combines live music, film screenings, exhibitions and educational activities throughout the city. The festival also includes SensoriaPro, an industry event that welcomes guests from the music, film and game industries. Sensoria also delivers educational work and musci industry support all year round including Resonator sessions. Company limited by guarantee no 6644266.
